page.title: 20East & West Ayton
page.content: The Forge Valley Hotel has residential accommodation and the Caravan Club have opened a new site in 1985.in West Ayton. The village hall houses many local groups and is in constant use for meetings and social gatherings. The villagers worked hard to raise funds for a bowling green which is very popular. The cricket club hosts regular matches on an excellent field behind the village hall. The County Council has moved into the disused railway station and has there a storage depot and offices. There is a public library in West Ayton for the benifit of all villages in the area. Forge Valley carved out by the glaciers is a famous beauty spot popular with residents and visitors to the area.
